ygData.subject: Re: End of Kiting?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... According to quotes from Brad, the expansion pack only needed artists, and not coders, as it s based on the same code that the main game runs. He could
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Aug 25/99, James Schuldes <jgs@...> wrote:
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Can you say "expansion pack" ??
>
According to quotes from Brad, the expansion pack only needed artists,
and not coders, as it's based on the same code that the main game runs.
He could have been lying I suppose.

> Also - how long was the public beta - a year or more? even with such a long
> time you just don't know how it works when it gets played by 15 to 20,000
> people every night.
>

Well P4 beta was a little over a month, but I think that was mainly
stress testing and final fix up testing. Even there, there are still
bugs many of us reported back in P4 in the game. The bard songs above
L20 weren't even in P4 on any vendor until the second last day of the
test.

Betas before P4 were limited to about 350 people if I recall.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
